title: Is ReFAI the future? | ReFi Recap 01/13
html:
GM GM Regens! It's Trinity from CARBON copy. Moving forward, I'll be publishing a new weekly roundup of key news and developments in the ReFi ecosystem - 'ReFi Recap'.

I hope you touched some trees during the weekend. Here's a recap of key happenings last week in the ReFi space, including the regen alphas you missed üëá

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Info

If you have GLM locked, consider allocating some to Atlantis, Regens Unite, and ReFi DAO during the Octant allocation window, which closes at 4 PM UTC on January 24, 2024.

Octant Epoch 6 Allocation

ü§ñ Is ReFAI the future?

The year 2025 kicked off with a surge of interest in AI agents within the ReFi sector, giving rise to what‚Äôs now known as ReFAI: Regenerative AI Finance. Leading the charge are projects like ReFi Starter, Detrash, and RiFai Sicillia along with builders like TMO, Regenavocado, and Kevin Owocki. The big question remains: are AI agents delivering real-world use cases, or are we merely caught up in the hype? In the latest CARBON Copy newsletter, we explore AI agents and their practical applications, particularly in simplifying crypto interfacing for ReFi.

Read full article

üóûÔ∏è Now the headlines:

  3. Last day to apply to the Celo Citizen Retro program, allocating 250,000 CELO to individuals in the ecosystem https://easyretropgf.xyz/celo-citizen-retro
